content: Hi! MeasureTheory.Measure.mconv has MeasureTheory.Measure.conv as an additive version, but to_additive will not translate mconv to conv in theorem names. This typically gives the wrong name to MeasureTheory.Measure.dirac_zero_mconv (it should be dirac_zero_conv). Is there a way to fix this other than just passing manually the correct name each time?

Sorry just found #mathlib4 > to_additive gives error "can't transport XYZ to itself" which should solve the issue. Perhaps it would be worth mentioning this in the docstring of to_additive which appears when hovering over the attribute.
Would you mind PRing a change to the docstring?
No problem, I intended to do it.
